Main content starts here, tab to start navigating History + Vision With an impressive 10,000 square footage, 495 is a multi-level Event Venue located in Downtown Charleston on Historic King Street with two levels of dedicated private event space and third level Rooftop Bar. 495 blends modern sophistication with the charm of historic architecture. The first level floor-to-ceiling glass exterior provides abundant natural light, accentuating the buildings original art deco architectural elements and complementing the heritage of 495 King Street. The Walnut Room is a grandeur space with soaring ceilings and expansive floor plan for a variety of configurations steps from King Street. On the second level, two dedicated private rooms provide intimate dining and reception space. Maplewood wainscoting and artisan lighting provide a warm ambiance to any occasion. Perched on the third level, the rooftop Satellite Bar offers 360 degree views of downtown Charleston's skyline. The vibrant rooftop bar extends the entire building providing an oasis above the hustle and bustle of Upper King Street. Boasting a unique concept of event space Open Daily for cocktails and light bites, Satellite Bar can be privately reserved for events up to 150 guests or partially reserved for up to 75 guests. At the heart of Events at 495 is an unwavering commitment to hospitality, detail, and passion for creating unforgettable memories through life's celebrations. For more information and capacities on each space, click on the images below. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Charleston’s Premier Rooftop Bar Menu Things to Know The rooftop is open to guests of all ages before 9:00 PM. After 9 PM, admittance is restricted to guests aged 21+ The Satellite Bar does not take reservations. Light Bites served until 7:00 PM. Hours MONDAY - THURSDAY 4:00 PM to CLOSE FRIDAY 12:00 PM to CLOSE SATURDAY - SUNDAY 12:00 PM to CLOSE Come Sip with Us Private Parties and Events Satellite Bar can be reserved for private events up to 150 guests For more information and pricing inquire below Let's Start Planning!
